item.description: Zipping your site’s wp-content folderTo compress a WordPress site to a ZIP file, you can use a plugin such as WP-Optimize or WP-Sweep.

item.title: How to Migrate your WordPress site
item.description: Migrating your siteTo migrate your site to Site Bay, follow these steps: Sign up for a Site Bay account and create a new site.
